layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x70
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x70
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (25,25) size 750x20 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#000080]
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 750x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 634x19
          text run at (0,0) width 362: "This paragraph should be in a blue block near the top of the "
          text run at (362,0) width 272: "page. Around it on all sides should be purple."
